      • setStringContent

        public void setStringContent(java.util.Comparator<java.lang.String> stringComparator)
        Specifies how to handle the content. If there is a string comparator, content is handled as strings and it is possible to look for best matches; otherwise, it is treated as abstract objects, matching is done by identity.
